name: Playfully Gruesome
description: In "Playfully Gruesome", players take on the role of a renowned surgeon in the medieval dark ages. With a reputation for treating patients with questionable and oftentimes damaging solutions, the player is presented with a challenge unlike any other. The queen's son, burdened with the recognizable deformities of his lineage, seeks the player's help in restoring his appearance to that of his handsome regal ancestor. As the player navigates the complexities of medieval medicine, they must keep track of the four humors and use both surgical procedures and apothecary elements to balance them, all while striving to restore the patient's appearance to a level that will allow him to carry on the Chadsburg bloodline. The player must work delicately to complete their task, as any misstep could result in the patient's death. "Playfully Gruesome" combines elements of strategy and puzzle-solving, as players must carefully balance their surgical procedures and apothecary recipes to achieve their ultimate goal: a perfectly restored Chadsburg prince ready to continue his family's legacy.
